thread.section_title: Gild Hall, a Thompson Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Like home!
thread.title_full: Like home! - Review of Gild Hall, a Thompson Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jiani B
title: Like home!
text: It felt like coming home! The staff provided authentic service and were welcoming. It is a lovely, beautiful and quaint hotel in downtown Manhattan! I highly recommend this hotel. The restaurant in the hotel is beautiful and cosy and it was certainly a treat to eat there - the food was very delicious. Excellent value.
